channel.title: Game Making on Todmorden Events
channel.description: Recent content in Game Making on Todmorden Events

item.title: Pixel art for games, characters and tiles
item.description:
A practical session focused on making simple sprites, character animations, and tiles for top-down and platform games.

Beginners welcome. Suitable for ages 9+ with an accompanying adult.

item.title: JAMM Labs game making drop-in
item.description:
An informal drop-in for children, young people, and families to explore game making using simple templates, pixel art, and playful experiments.

Suitable for ages 8+ with an accompanying adult. No prior coding experience needed.
